name: A New Hole
description:
A New Hole: A game by Ryan Laseter and Jorge Romero.

You are the defender of the new ant hole, and must protect your queen from the on-coming onslaught of enemy ants.

Sprites/music have their sources listed in Credits, animations and background art done in-house, as well as all coding done by hand. AStar was used for AI paths (thanks for the tutorial Brackeys!)

Please enjoy the game! All feedback welcome.
